actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Committee ordered favorably reported an original bill (S.3107) in lieu of this measure.

official_title: A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize an amended appropriation for fiscal year 1983.
short_title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1982 and 1983

summary.text: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1982 and 1983 - Amends the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize additional appropriations for FY 1983.

titles.title: Board for International Broadcasting Authorization Act, Fiscal Years 1982 and 1983
A bill to amend the Board for International Broadcasting Act of 1973 to authorize an amended appropriation for fiscal year 1983.
